Package dev.forbit.server.packets

Interface PacketInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionPacket, GSONConnectionPacket, GSONPacket, GSONPingPacket, Packet, PingPacket, RegisterPacket
public interface PacketInterface
Common methods shared between Packet and GSONPacket
